wikipedia_page.main: George Theophilus Miles FRCO (23 February 1913 – 26 March 1988) was an English organist and organ teacher based in Birmingham.

response: The organ dates from 1975, replacing a previous instrument destroyed in a fire. The organ specification was designed by George Miles, the church organist, and can be found on the National Pipe Organ Register.
*George Miles 1946Who's who in Music. Shaw Publishing Ltd. First Post War Edition. 1949-50 - 1988
*George Miles (1913–88), organist, was curate of St. George's Church, Benenden 1919–22.
* George Miles (organist) (1913–1988), English organist and organ teacher
* George Herbert Miles, brother of Frederick George Miles of Miles Aircraft Ltd.
